code: import axios from'axios';var axiosins=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:8000"});var UserApi={getAll:function getAll(){return axiosins.request({url:"/users",method:"GET"});},getSingle:function getSingle(id){return axiosins.request({url:"/users/".concat(id),method:"GET"});},create:function create(user){return axiosins.request({url:"/users",method:"POST",data:user});},update:function update(user,id){return axiosins.request({url:"users/".concat(id),method:"PUT",data:user});},delete:function _delete(id){return axiosins.request({url:"/users/".concat(id),method:"DELETE"});}};export default UserApi;var axiosin=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:8000"});var api={get:function get(){return axiosin.request({method:"GET"});},post:function post(data){return axios.request({method:"POST",url:"/users",data:data});},updating:function updating(data,id){return axios.request({method:"Patch",url:"/user/".concat(id),data:data});},dele:function dele(id){return axios.request({method:"DELETE",url:"/user/${id}"});}};
